contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|application|applications}} '''Application''' may refer to: *A verbal or written [[question|request]]: **[[Application for employment]], a form or collection of forms that an individual seeking employment must fill out when seeking employment ** [[Patent application]], a request pending at a patent office for the grant of a patent * [[Application software]], computer software designed to help the user to perform specific tasks * [[Function application]] in mathematics and computer science * [[Application (virtue)]], a characteristic encapsulated in diligence {{disambiguation}}
